long_description: From soups and sauces to fruit rolls and jerky, you can make your own yummy and nutritious trail food with this fast and simple Open Country 700-watt FD-75SK dehydrator. Converga-Flow(R) drying system pushes heated air across each tray ensuring fast, even drying with no need to rotate the trays. 700 watts of power delivers tasty results in hours, not days. Adjustable thermostat from 95deg to 160deg allows you to create a wide variety of snacks using meats, fruits and vegetables. Five trays provide ample space for drying; expands up to 14 trays (additional trays sold separately). Plastic perforated sheet works well with small foods, herbs or sticky fruits such as bananas or pineapple. Fruit roll sheet is ideal for use with liquids, purees or sauces. Includes a 39-page instruction and recipe booklet to get you started.
short_description: From soups and sauces to fruit rolls and jerky, you can make your own yummy and nutritious trail food with this fast and simple Open Country 700-watt FD-75SK dehydrator.
